parameter.name: fileId
parameter.description: The ID of the file to update

parameter.name: convert
parameter.description: Whether to convert this file to the corresponding Google Docs format

parameter.name: newRevision
parameter.description: Whether a blob upload should create a new revision

parameter.name: ocrLanguage
parameter.description: If ocr is true, hints at the language to use

parameter.name: pinned
parameter.description: Whether to pin the new revision

parameter.name: setModifiedDate
parameter.description: Whether to set the modified date with the supplied modified date

parameter.name: timedTextLanguage
parameter.description: The language of the timed text

parameter.name: updateViewedDate
parameter.description: Whether to update the view date after successfully updating the file

parameter.name: useContentAsIndexableText
parameter.description: Whether to use the content as indexable text
